bibl.title: Herakleides. A Portrait Mummy from Roman Egypt.

bibl.seg: CORCORAN Lorelei H. and Marie SVOBODA, Herakleides. A Portrait Mummy from Roman Egypt.
Los Angeles, J. Paul Getty Museum, 2010, 8Â°, 112 pp., 1 carte, nombr. figg. coul. ISBN 978-1-60606-036-0. $25.

Introduction. - Mummy Portraits and Portrait Mummies. - Description of the Mummy of Herakleides [acquired by the J.
